content.query:
CREATE TABLE fire.stg_calls_2001_part
	(
	 [dataType] varchar(100),
	 [dataSubtype] varchar(100),
	 [dateTime] datetime2(7),
	 [date] date,
	 [category] varchar(100),
	 [subcategory] varchar(100),
	 [status] varchar(100),
	 [address] varchar(100),
	 [latitude] float,
	 [longitude] float,
	 [source] varchar(100),
	 [extendedProperties] varchar(100)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    PARTITION ([date] RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES
    ('20010401', '20010801'))
	);
GO

INSERT INTO fire.stg_calls_2001_part
SELECT [dataType]
      ,[dataSubtype]
      ,[dateTime]
	  ,CONVERT(DATE, [dateTime]) as [Date]
      ,[category]
      ,[subcategory]
      ,[status]
      ,[address]
      ,[latitude]
      ,[longitude]
      ,[source]
      ,[extendedProperties]
FROM [fire].[stg_calls_2001]

SELECT count(*) FROM fire.stg_calls_2001_part;
GO
